A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: WATCH THIS MOVIE MORE THAN ONCE!! Guys\, I hated this movie as much\, if not more than\, as you the first time I saw it in theaters opening\, 1 am in the morning. HUGE SW fan\, and I loved TFA and especially Rogue One. Watch. This. Movie. Again. It’s far from my favorite in the series\, but it holds up just fine and I really think it will get better with age. Don’t let the recoil from the shocking spit on every theory we theorized on for over a year ruin this movie for you. It’s different\, it’s fresh\, there are genuine SW moments. My rating may get better over time\, may get worse. But see this movie a second time!
